snippet: The Dutch government apologized on Monday for ignoring the risks posed by earthquakes caused by production of natural gas in the northern province of Groningen.
abstract: Dutch government apologizes after official report accuses them, along with Royal Dutch Shell and Exxon Mobil, of putting profit ahead of safety and ignoring earthquake risk in natural gas production in northern province of Groningen.
lead_paragraph: The Dutch government apologized on Monday for ignoring the risks posed by earthquakes caused by production of natural gas in the northern province of Groningen.

headline.print_headline: Netherlands Regrets Ignoring Earthquakes at Natgas Field
headline.main: Netherlands Regrets Ignoring Earthquakes at Natgas Field
